tool_description: The Quotel - Quotes api gives you easy access to 1.000.000+ quotes by 30.000+ authors, scientists, celebrities, musicians, politicians, athletes, famous people from history and many more with features such as Quote of the day, random quote, full text search, quotes categorised into over 100 topics like "love", "wisdom" and "inspirational",  and many more.
name: Quotel - Quotes
title: Quotel - Quotes

api_list.name: GetLanguages
api_list.description: Use this route to get the languages supported by the api at any moment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotel-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/meta/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotel-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://quotel-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/meta/languages"

print(response.json())

born.description: The date this author was born

count.description: The popularity index of the author

hasIcelandicQuotes.description: Whether or not this author has some icelandic quotes

nrOfEnglishQuotes.description: How many quotes in English this author has

nrOfIcelandicQuotes.description: How many quotes in Icelandic this author has

api_list.name: GetQODHistory
api_list.description: Use this route to get the history of quotes of the day for each language or for each topic -- starting from Middle of July 2021.
api_list.code:

url = "https://quotel-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/qod/history"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotel-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetRandomQuote

topicId.description: The topic's Id that this QOD is quote of the day of

topicName.description: The topic's name that this QOD is quote of the day of
